text: Was recommended by a client to Thomson Specialist Dentistry for my daughter’s braces treatment. Dr Low Hwee Hiang quoted reasonably for the course of treatment and was tentatively slightly below from all the rest of the dentist clinics I enquired. Highly recommended Dr Low as she meticulously handled my daughter’s teeth and over a period of 2 years monthly visit, my daughter teeth is beautifully straightened and face shape changed. Also to highlight admin Gigi Tan whom have help me with adjusting the appointments which is so important for my busy schedules, and my girl’s school. Overall, highly recommended Thompson Specialist Dentistry for your dental needs for their professionalism and personalized services.

I have always had a great experience at Thomson Specialist Dentistry. The staff are warm, welcoming and professional.
Dr. Shirley Yap is friendly and gentle, thorough in examination and clearly explains issues and management plans. I feel so confident that I am in very good hands.
I highly recommend this office to anyone looking for top quality dental care!

Amazing service! The doctor and the staff members are very attentive and professional! I had a wonderful experience with Dr Michele Chia for root canal treatment. She is extremely professional, brilliant at her job, and always takes time to answer all of my questions thoroughly. I highly recommend Dr Michele Chia and Thomson Specialist Dentistry!

Been seeing Dr Teo for more than 10 years now. Dentist with a heart, would recommend him to anyone and everyone. As for the staff, perfect service every single time. Keep up the great work, Lydia, Berlin and Juriah!

Always a pleasant time evert visit to Thomson Specialist Dentistry!

From the friendly receptionist to the reassurance by Dr Low, the professional staff puts me at ease during my treatment sessions.

Well connected from the nearest mrt too!
